mapper.sql: routing_id, routing_name, user_id, r_start_time, r_end_time, production_line
mapper.insert:
insert into routing
routing_id,
routing_name,
user_id,
r_start_time,
r_end_time,
production_line,
#{routingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{routingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update routing
routing_name = #{routingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r_start_time = #{rStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
r_end_time = #{rEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
production_line = #{productionLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where routing_id = #{routingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update routing set routing_name = #{routingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r_start_time = #{rStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, r_end_time = #{rEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, production_line = #{productionLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where routing_id = #{routingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select routing.*,user.* from routing INNER JOIN user ON routing.user_id = user.user_id where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select routing.*,user.* from routing INNER JOIN user ON routing.user_id = user.user_id
